      • useEffect

        public void useEffect(TargetParameter target,
                      java.util.ArrayList<java.util.ArrayList<Player>> previousTarget)
               throws InvalidTargetException,
                      NoOwnerException
        method to apply the effect of the power up if there is all target needed
        Parameters:
        target - target parameters from the client
        previousTarget - previous target of the effect
        Throws:
        InvalidTargetException - when the parameters of the target are wrong for this type of power up
        NoOwnerException - when in the target parameters is missing the owner
